item.description:
Last minute, I can't make Saturday's Mt Pierce hike. The description is the bascically the same though.

6.4 miles RT. Book time is 4:25, but book time means diddly-squat in the winter.

It's winter in the Whites, you need to be prepared: 10 Essentials + full winter gear.

Consider me to be a Social Coordinator, not a guide. You need to be fully prepared for this hike on your own, including all maps, directions, gear, etc.

It looks like there will be significant fresh snow on Sunday. This is a popular trail, but don't count on it being broken out. My last winter hike it took us 3 hours to go less than 2 miles since we were breaking trail through 1 to 2 feet of snow most of the way.

We will agree to a turn-around time before leaving the trailhead, and will turn back if the conditions warrant.

The summit is optional. Returning to the trailhead is mandatory.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy at the trailhead, blue Corolla with MA plates
item.why: Cuz I ain't been hiking in weeks, and it's making me crazy
item.name: Mt Pierce via Crawford Path
